DESCRIPTION: A card with #yBloodcast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. You lose #b1 HP for each missing Energy.
A card with #yGoldcast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. You lose #b10 Gold for each missing Energy.
A card with #yPotioncast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. You lose #b1 Potion for each missing Energy.
Instead of spending Energy on a card with Leftcast, discard that many cards from your hand, starting from the left.
A card with #yRelicast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. You lose #b1 random Relic for each missing Energy.
Instead of spending Energy on a card with Retaincast, #yExhaust that many cards with #yRetain from your hand, starting from the left.
A card with #yWalltorchcast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. Snuff out 1 lit wall torch for each missing Energy.
A card with #yCorpsecast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. Destroy 1 monster corpse for each missing Energy.
A card with #yWoundcast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. Add 1 Wound into your hand for each missing Energy.
A card with #yShivcast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. Add 1 Shiv into your hand for each missing Energy.
A card with #yGremlincast can be played if you don't have enough Energy. Summon 1 Gremlin for each missing Energy.
Any card with "Strike" in its name.
While held, gain [E] at the start of your turn and played #yAttacks #yExhaust. NL When #yActivated, choose #b1 of #b3 #yAttacks to add into your hand.
While held, gain #b1 #yBlock whenever you play a card. NL When #yActivated, apply #b1 #yWeak to ALL enemies.
While held, you have #b1 additional #yStrength. NL When #yActivated, gain #b1 #yStrength.
While held, every time you play #b3 cards, deal #b3 damage to ALL enemies. NL When #yActivated, apply #b1 #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.
While held, every time you play #b3 cards, draw #b1 card. NL When #yActivated, gain [E] .
Pestered creatures take #b25% more damage from Attacks.
